discussion.content:
AC are correct, P39 Study Guide
B is incorrect as authentication is successfull, response = 0, p39 study guide.
D is incorrect as auth is using MSCHAP2 not MSCHAP

choices.C: The RADIUS server sent a vendor-specific attribute in the RADIUS response.
choices.A: The user student belongs to the SSLVPN group.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BC
167 and 169 in Study Guide

choices.B: FortiManager obtains the FortiSwitch status information by querying the FortiGate REST API every three minutes.
choices.D: Any switch discovered or authorized on FortiGate must be added manually on FortiSwitch manager.
choices.C: If the administrator makes any changes on FortiSwitch manager, they must also install those changes on FortiGate so that those changes are applied on the managed switches.
choices.A: Per-device management is the default management mode on FortiManager.

questions.question_text: Which two statements about FortiSwitch manager are true? (Choose two.)
Which two statements about MAC address quarantine by redirect mode are true? (Choose two.)

choices.C: It is the default mode for MAC address quarantine.
choices.A: The quarantined device is moved to the quarantine VLAN.
choices.B: The device MAC address is added to the QuarantinedDevices firewall address group.
choices.D: The quarantined device is kept in the current VLAN.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BD
study guide p. 285 and 286

Selected Answer: BD
Also defined in page 285 of study guide

Selected Answer: C
p. 267
"In cases where y device does not support 802.1x you can configure the security profile to place that device in the VLAN selected as GuestVLAN"
Alternatively, MAC auth bypass could be done, but it's disabled.
A is wrong, we have a MACbased profile which is able to authenticate multiple devices connected to the same port.
D is wrong because you would have to disable EAP passthrough to terminate EAP on FortiSwitch

questions.question_text:
Refer to the exhibit.
//IMG//

Examine the FortiSwitch security policy shown in the exhibit.
If the security profile shown in the exhibit is assigned to all ports on a FortiSwitch device for 802.1X authentication, which statement about the switch is correct?

choices.D: All EAP messages will be terminated on FortiSwitch.
choices.A: FortiSwitch cannot authenticate multiple devices connected to the same port.
choices.C: FortiSwitch will assign non-802.1X devices to the onboarding VLAN.
choices.B: FortiSwitch will try to authenticate non-802.1X devices using the device MAC address as the username and password.
Configure the FortiGate device in the Security Fabric with a FortiAnalyzer device.
choices.D: Configure the wireless network to be in bridge mode.
choices.C: Configure a firewall policy to allow communication.
choices.A: Configure the wireless network to be in tunnel mode.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AB
Tunnel mode because itÂ´s essential that the traffic passes the firewall. p. 395
But C is wrong as the traffic, as the traffic is blocked (p. 395)
B, because FortiAnalyzer processes the logs using information from IOC services

Selected Answer: AB
Quarantine function only works on tunnel mode https://docs.fortinet.com/document/fortiap/6.4.0/fortiwifi-and-fortiap-cookbook/175405/configuring-quarantine-on-ssid#:~:text=To%20quarantine%20a%20wireless%20client%20on%20the,Go%20to%20Security%20Fabric%20%3E%20Physical%20Topology.
